TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TextPattern extends System.Windows.Automation.BasePattern

summary.span: 表示包含文本的控件。

span.span: Represents controls that contain text.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 类可能无法提供有关仅在特定的 UI 自动化提供程序中存在的文本功能。The class may not provide for text features that exist only in a particular UI Automation provider. 这些唯一且经常是一些高级功能，类提供了有关 UI 自动化客户端以访问相应本机对象模型的方法。For these unique and often advanced features, the class provides methods for a UI Automation client to access the corresponding native object model.

related.span: UI 自动化控件模式概述

span.span: UI Automation Control Patterns Overview

related.span: 客户端的 UI 自动化控件模式

span.span: UI Automation Control Patterns for Clients

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly AnimationStyleAttribute As AutomationTextAttribute

summary.span: 标识文本范围的 特性。

span.span: Identifies the attribute of a text range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 动画; 仅在屏幕上显示经过动画处理的文本打印，但动画效果却没有。Animations appear on the screen only; the animated text prints, but the animation effect does not. UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用此标识符。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自动化提供程序应使用中的等效字段。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . UI 自动化客户端获取属性的值通过调用。UI Automation clients get the value of the attribute by calling . 此属性的值的类型是。Values for this attribute are of type . 默认值为 。The default value is . ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何获取 Microsoft 记事本中的文本范围的属性值。The following example shows how to obtain an attribute value for a range of text in Microsoft Notepad. > [!NOTE] > 文本提供程序，例如目的仅用作 Microsoft 记事本。Microsoft Notepad is used as the text provider for example purposes only. 不保证 Microsoft 记事本，以支持所请求的属性值。Microsoft Notepad is not guaranteed to support the attribute value being requested. MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly CultureAttribute As AutomationTextAttribute

summary.span: 标识细化到子语言级别的文本范围的 () 特性；例如，瑞士法语 (fr-CH)，而不是法语 (fr)。

span.span: Identifies the () attribute of a text range down to the sub-language level; for example, French–Switzerland (fr-CH) instead of French (fr).

remarks.format: ## Remarks UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用此标识符。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自动化提供程序应使用中的等效字段。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . UI 自动化客户端获取属性的值通过调用。UI Automation clients get the value of the attribute by calling . 此属性的值的类型是。Values for this attribute are of type . 默认值为应用程序用户界面的语言。The default value is the language of the application user interface. 请参阅的语言代码格式的详细信息。See for more detail on the language code format. > [!NOTE] > 可能存在的服务器不支持的语言标记或作者不能使用它的情况。There might be cases where the server does not support the language tag or authors cannot use it. 在这些情况下将应用默认值。In those cases the default applies. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何获取 Microsoft 记事本中的文本范围的属性值。The following example shows how to obtain an attribute value for a range of text in Microsoft Notepad. > [!NOTE] > 文本提供程序，例如目的仅用作 Microsoft 记事本。Microsoft Notepad is used as the text provider for example purposes only. 不保证 Microsoft 记事本，以支持所请求的属性值。Microsoft Notepad is not guaranteed to support the attribute value being requested. [!code-csharp[UIATextPattern_snip#1005](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/CSharp/SearchWindow.cs#1005)] [!code-vb[UIATextPattern_snip#2005](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/VisualBasic/SearchWindow.vb#2005)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property DocumentRange As TextPatternRange

summary.span: 获取包含文档主文本的文本范围。

span.span: Gets a text range that encloses the main text of a document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不可能包括一些辅助的文本，比如标头、 页脚或批注。Some auxiliary text such as headers, footnotes, or annotations might not be included. ## Examples 在下面的代码示例，targetTextPattern 成员变量是从感兴趣的文本提供程序获取对象。In the following code example, the targetTextPattern member variable is a object obtained from a text provider of interest. MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly FontWeightAttribute As AutomationTextAttribute

summary.span: 标识文本范围的 特性。

span.span: Identifies the attribute of a text range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性引用的一种字体的相对笔画粗细。This attribute refers to the relative stroke, thickness, or boldness of a font. 此属性以它为模型`lfWeight`GDI LOGFONT 中的字段。This attribute is modeled after the `lfWeight` field in GDI LOGFONT. 为了保持一致，以下值已采用从 LOGFONT: 0 = DontCare，100 = 瘦客户端，200 = ExtraLight 或 UltraLight，300 = 浅，400 = 正常或常规，500 = 中等; 600 = 本或 DemiBold，700 = 加粗，800 = ExtraBold 或 UltraBold，以及 900 = 频繁或黑色。For consistency, the following values have been adopted from LOGFONT: 0=DontCare, 100=Thin, 200=ExtraLight or UltraLight, 300=Light, 400=Normal or Regular, 500=Medium, 600=SemiBold or DemiBold, 700=Bold, 800=ExtraBold or UltraBold, and 900=Heavy or Black. UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用此标识符。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自动化提供程序应使用中的等效字段。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . UI 自动化客户端获取属性的值通过调用。UI Automation clients get the value of the attribute by calling . 此属性的值的类型是。Values for this attribute are of type . 默认值为 `zero`。The default value is `zero`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何获取 Microsoft 记事本中的文本范围的属性值。The following example shows how to obtain an attribute value for a range of text in Microsoft Notepad. > [!NOTE] > 文本提供程序，例如目的仅用作 Microsoft 记事本。Microsoft Notepad is used as the text provider for example purposes only. 不保证 Microsoft 记事本，以支持所请求的属性值。Microsoft Notepad is not guaranteed to support the attribute value being requested. [!code-csharp[UIATextPattern_snip#1008](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/CSharp/SearchWindow.cs#1008)] [!code-vb[UIATextPattern_snip#2008](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/VisualBasic/SearchWindow.vb#2008)]

summary.span: 标识文本范围的 (COLORREF) 属性。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性的值等效于文本或字体颜色。The value of this attribute is equivalent to the text or font color. UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用此标识符。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自动化提供程序应使用中的等效字段。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . [!code-csharp[UIATextPattern_snip#1009](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/CSharp/SearchWindow.cs#1009)] [!code-vb[UIATextPattern_snip#2009](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/VisualBasic/SearchWindow.vb#2009)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange[] GetSelection() cil managed

summary.span: 检索与当前文本选择（或多个文本选择）关联的不连续文本范围的集合。

span.span: Retrieves a collection of disjoint text ranges associated with the current text selection or selections.

returns.span: 不连续文本范围的集合。

span.span: A collection of disjoint text ranges.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果没有选定任何文本，系统游标 （文本插入点） 的位置返回退化文本范围 （空范围）。If no text is selected, returns the degenerate text range (empty range) at the position of the system cursor (text insertion point). 如果系统光标 （文本插入点） 不存在，请可能会返回`null`。If the system cursor (text insertion point) is not present, might return `null`. > [!NOTE] > 使用要测试是否由控件支持选定文本或文本的插入点的定位属性。Use the property to test if text selection or positioning of the text insertion point is supported by the control. ## Examples [!code-csharp[UIATextPattern_snip#1046](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/CSharp/SearchWindow.cs#1046)] [!code-vb[UIATextPattern_snip#2046](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/VisualBasic/SearchWindow.vb#2046)]

exception.span: 文本容器不支持文本选择。

span.span: The text container does not support text selection.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange[] GetVisibleRanges() cil managed

summary.span: 从文本容器中检索一个不连续文本范围的数组，其中每个文本范围都以第一个部分可见的行开始，以最后一个部分可见的行结束。

span.span: Retrieves an array of disjoint text ranges from a text container where each text range begins with the first partially visible line through to the end of the last partially visible line.

returns.span: 容器内可见文本范围的集合或者一个空数组。

span.span: The collection of visible text ranges within the container or an empty array.
is never returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 不连续的文本范围的文本容器的任何内容将被遮盖的重叠窗口或其他对象，或者具有多列布局的文本容器具有一个或多个列部分滚动到视图之外时可能发生。Disjoint text ranges may occur when any content of a text container is obscured by an overlapping window or other object, or when a text container with a multi-column layout has one or more columns partially scrolled out of view. 如果没有文本可见，则返回的退化 （空） 文本范围。If no text is visible, a degenerate (empty) text range is returned. 文本容器是否为空或所有文本滚动都到视图之外时，可以返回此空范围。This empty range can be returned if the text container is empty or when all text is scrolled out of view. ## Examples [!code-csharp[UIATextPattern_snip#VisibleRanges](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/CSharp/SearchWindow.cs#visibleranges)] [!code-vb[UIATextPattern_snip#VisibleRanges](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/VisualBasic/SearchWindow.vb#visibleranges)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly HorizontalTextAlignmentAttribute As AutomationTextAttribute

summary.span: 标识文本范围的 特性。

span.span: Identifies the attribute of a text range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性表示应用于与调用的文本范围关联的段落的水平文本对齐方式。This attribute represents the horizontal text alignment applied to the paragraph(s) associated with the calling text range. UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用此标识符。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自动化提供程序应使用中的等效字段。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . [!code-csharp[UIATextPattern_snip#1011](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/CSharp/SearchWindow.cs#1011)] [!code-vb[UIATextPattern_snip#2011](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/VisualBasic/SearchWindow.vb#2011)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性表示以磅为单位的尾随缩进 () 应用于与调用的文本范围关联的段落。This attribute represents the trailing indentation in points () applied to the paragraph(s) associated with the calling text range. UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用此标识符。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自动化提供程序应使用中的等效字段。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . UI 自动化客户端获取属性的值通过调用。UI Automation clients get the value of the attribute by calling . 此属性的值的类型是。Values for this attribute are of type . 默认值为 `zero`。The default value is `zero`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何获取 Microsoft 记事本中的文本范围的属性值。The following example shows how to obtain an attribute value for a range of text in Microsoft Notepad. > [!NOTE] > 文本提供程序，例如目的仅用作 Microsoft 记事本。Microsoft Notepad is used as the text provider for example purposes only. 不保证 Microsoft 记事本，以支持所请求的属性值。Microsoft Notepad is not guaranteed to support the attribute value being requested. remarks.format: ## Remarks 此属性表示与调用的文本范围关联的文档的只读状态。This attribute represents the read-only state of the document associated with the calling text range. > [!NOTE] > 如果文档或文件是只读的但仍可以对其进行编辑，并将其保存为另一个文件，则不会认为该文本，只读的。If a document or file is read-only, but you can still edit it and save it as another file, the text is not considered read-only. MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange RangeFromChild(class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement childElement) cil managed
Public Function RangeFromChild (childElement As AutomationElement) As TextPatternRange

span.span: The enclosed object.

summary.span: 检索包含子元素（例如图像、超链接、[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xl](~/includes/tlasharptla-xl-md.md)] 电子表格或其他嵌入对象）的一个文本范围。

span.span: Retrieves a text range enclosing a child element such as an image, hyperlink, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xl](~/includes/tlasharptla-xl-md.md)] spreadsheet, or other embedded object.

returns.span: 涵盖子元素的一个范围。

span.span: A range that spans the child element.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果存在的子元素的范围中没有的文本，则返回退化 （空） 范围。If there is no text in the range where the child element exists, a degenerate (empty) range is returned. `childElement`参数为的子与关联或从子元素的数组。The `childElement` parameter is either a child of the associated with a or from the array of children of a . ## Examples [!code-csharp[UIATextPattern_snip#GetTextElement](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/CSharp/SearchWindow.cs#gettextelement)] [!code-vb[UIATextPattern_snip#GetTextElement](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/VisualBasic/SearchWindow.vb#gettextelement)] [!code-csharp[UIATextPattern_snip#GetRangeFromChild](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/CSharp/SearchWindow.cs#getrangefromchild)] [!code-vb[UIATextPattern_snip#GetRangeFromChild](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/VisualBasic/SearchWindow.vb#getrangefromchild)]

span.span: The child element is .

exception.span: 元素不是文本容器的子元素。

span.span: The element is not a child of the text container.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance class System.Windows.Automation.Text.TextPatternRange RangeFromPoint(valuetype System.Windows.Point screenLocation) cil managed
Public Function RangeFromPoint (screenLocation As Point) As TextPatternRange

param.name: screenLocation
param.span: 以屏幕坐标的形式表示的位置。

span.span: The location in screen coordinates.

summary.span: 返回与指定屏幕坐标最接近的退化（空）文本范围。

span.span: Returns the degenerate (empty) text range nearest to the specified screen coordinates.

returns.span: 与指定位置最接近的退化范围。

span.span: A degenerate range nearest the specified location.
is never returned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 如果屏幕坐标中的图像的坐标，则返回包含子对象的文本范围的超链接，[!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xl](~/includes/tlasharptla-xl-md.md)]电子表格或其他嵌入的对象。A text range that wraps a child object is returned if the screen coordinates are within the coordinates of an image, hyperlink, [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_xl](~/includes/tlasharptla-xl-md.md)] spreadsheet, or other embedded object. 因为不忽略隐藏的文本，则返回从给定点最接近的可见文本的退化范围。Because hidden text is not ignored by , a degenerate range from the visible text closest to the given point is returned. ## Examples [!code-csharp[UIATextPattern_snip#1049](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/CSharp/SearchWindow.cs#1049)] [!code-vb[UIATextPattern_snip#1049](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/UIATextPattern_snip/VisualBasic/SearchWindow.vb#1049)]

exception.span: 给定点位于与文本模式关联的 的外部。

span.span: A given point is outside the associated with the text pattern.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly StrikethroughColorAttribute As AutomationTextAttribute

summary.span: 标识文本范围的 特性。

span.span: Identifies the attribute of a text range.

remarks.format: ## Remarks UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用此标识符。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications. UI 自动化提供程序应使用中的等效字段。UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . UI 自动化客户端获取属性的值通过调用。UI Automation clients get the value of the attribute by calling . 此属性的值的类型是。Values for this attribute are of type . 默认值为 `zero`。The default value is `zero`. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何获取 Microsoft 记事本中的文本范围的属性值。The following example shows how to obtain an attribute value for a range of text in Microsoft Notepad. > [!NOTE] > 文本提供程序，例如目的仅用作 Microsoft 记事本。Microsoft Notepad is used as the text provider for example purposes only. 不保证 Microsoft 记事本，以支持所请求的属性值。Microsoft Notepad is not guaranteed to support the attribute value being requested. MemberSignature.Value: .field public static initonly class System.Windows.Automation.AutomationEvent TextSelectionChangedEvent
Public Shared ReadOnly TextSelectionChangedEvent As AutomationEvent

summary.span: 标识在修改文本选择时引发的事件。

span.span: Identifies the event raised when the text selection is modified.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 一些文本控件作为零宽度文本选择处理文本插入点 （光标） 和可能引发`TextSelectionChangedEvent`当移动游标。Some text controls handle the text insertion point (cursor) as a zero-width text selection and might raise `TextSelectionChangedEvent` when the cursor is moved. > [!NOTE] > 若要跟随光标的移动，UI 自动化客户端建议将跟踪通过侦听对应的插入点的变化[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]元素事件，而不是具体取决于。To follow cursor movements, UI Automation clients are advised to keep track of insertion point changes by listening for corresponding [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] element events rather than depending on . 此标识符由 UI 自动化客户端应用程序 UI 自动化提供程序应使用中的等效字段。This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in . ## Examples [!code-csharp[FindText#SelectionChanged](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FindText/CSharp/SearchWindow.cs#selectionchanged)] [!code-vb[FindText#SelectionChanged](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/FindText/VisualBasic/SearchWindow.vb#selectionchanged)]
